オプション1:
Star Man grit his teeth and walked to the ruins.
When he reached them, he collapsed.
Triangle Man came over.
"What happened?"
"...Poison..."
"Huh?"
"I ate this... poison..."
Triangle Man stared closely at the red fruit.
"Water..."
"Water? Got it!"
Triangle Man and Square Man brought coconuts.

After drinking coconut water, Star Man was taken by the kids
to Trapezoid Man's room.
"You all right...?"

"Hah... hah... hah...
If I'd taken one more bite, I'd have died..."

"Aren't you supposed to test a little at a time instead of
 taking a whole bite right away?"
said Trapezoid Man.

"Hah... ha... ah...
I may have seen that online..."

"You dab the juice on your skin, touch it to your lips,
then eat about a grain‑of‑rice's worth... that kind of thing, right?"
"Right... What was that called again...?"
"Forgot..."

"Let's do that... the test‑a‑little‑at‑a‑time thing...
None of us knows anything about wild plants..."

"Oh... there's that thing where if you soak it in water for a week
you can eat it, right?"
"Yeah... I've heard of that."

Trapezoid Man thought to ask, "Want to try it with that red fruit from before?"
but seeing Star Man suffering, he decided not to.
The next morning.

Through the night, Star Man kept vomiting and having diarrhea,
and as a result, he'd grown gaunt.
(It's better... I think I can at least walk around near the place.)
When he went to the kids' room, there were lots of coconuts.
"Thanks for yesterday."
"That's a lot of coconuts. Did you knock all these down by throwing stones?"

"We stopped throwing stones halfway and just hit the nuts directly with a branch—
then they fell easily."
"I see."
(Smart...)

"I want to try the 'soak in water for a week' method Trapezoid Man mentioned yesterday.
I'll bring them in the evening, so help me then."
"O-okay."
Star Man went to fetch yesterday's red fruit.
